Hero.description: Specialist in AI Agents, Machine Learning and scalable web solutions.

About.title: About me
About.description: I’m a <important>AI and Data Science specialist</important> in training with a solid background as a Full Stack Developer. My main focus is <cyan>process automation</cyan> and building <important>Autonomous Agents</important> to solve complex business problems.

ai.title: Predictive AI
ai.desc: Data modelling to anticipate trends and behaviours.

dev.title: Full Stack Architecture
dev.desc: Specialist in Next.js, React and scalable ecosystems.

goal.title: Intelligent Automation
goal.desc: Reducing operational friction through LangGraph agents.

tfm.role: Master's Thesis – Autonomous AI Agents Development
tfm.description: Advanced AI development at Aceleralia focused on creating multi-agent systems using LangGraph. Implementation of cyclic control logic and state persistence for automating complex processes through specialized agents.

webDev.description: Developed scalable web solutions using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS within Agile Scrum environments. Focused on component modularity and performance optimization.

itTech.description: Managed hardware/software incident resolution and network troubleshooting. Ensured operational continuity through proactive technical support.

futsight.description: Intelligent platform that uses Gaussian Mixture Models (GMM) for probabilistic player segmentation and scouting analysis.

taskpilot.description: Smart agent capable of planning and executing complex tasks using LangGraph state machines.

fitness.description: E‑commerce platform for fitness equipment with real‑time inventory, booking system and secure payments.

raco.description: Elegant restaurant landing page showcasing menu, location and contact information with a modern design.
